$schema.description: The URL of the JSON schema used to validate this configuration file. Should match the Dev Proxy version.

apiPort.description: Port for the Dev Proxy API server.

asSystemProxy.description: Whether to set Dev Proxy as the system proxy.

filterByHeaders.description: List of headers to filter requests by. Each object specifies a header name and value.

ipAddress.description: IP address for Dev Proxy to listen on.

languageModel.description: Configuration for using a local language model with Dev Proxy.

cacheResponses.description: Whether to cache responses from the language model.

client.description: The client to use for the local language model.

enabled.description: Whether the language model integration is enabled.

model.description: The name of the language model to use.

url.description: URL of the local language model server.

logLevel.description: The minimum log level for Dev Proxy output.

newVersionNotification.description: Controls notifications about new Dev Proxy versions.

plugins.description: List of plugins to load. Each object defines a plugin instance.

configSection.description: Name of the configuration section for this plugin instance.

urlsToWatch.description: List of URL patterns for the plugin to watch.

port.description: Port for Dev Proxy to listen on.

record.description: Whether to record requests and responses.

urlsToWatch.description: List of URL patterns for Dev Proxy to intercept.

validateSchemas.description: Whether to validate configuration files against their schemas.

watchPids.description: List of process IDs to watch for network traffic.

watchProcessNames.description: List of process names to watch for network traffic.

timeout.description: Timeout in seconds for requests passing through Dev Proxy.
